name: Financial Advisor
description: Template for financial advisors focusing on client portfolios, market insights, recommendations, and compliance.

capturePrompts.label: Client Context
capturePrompts.prompt: Which client or portfolio is this about?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Client: John Smith, Portfolio: Growth Fund

capturePrompts.label: Market Insight
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Fed rate decision, Sector rotation, Earnings impact

capturePrompts.label: Recommendation
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Rebalance to 60/40, Increase bond allocation, Tax-loss harvest

capturePrompts.label: Risk Considerations
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Client risk tolerance, Market volatility, Concentration risk

capturePrompts.label: Compliance & Disclosure
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Suitability documentation, Disclosure required, Fiduciary duty

llmSystemPrompt: You are assisting a Financial Advisor. Focus on client-centric advice, portfolio management, and regulatory compliance. Identify action items for client meetings, portfolio reviews, and documentation. Always consider suitability and fiduciary responsibilities.
